root.title: schult home corp make initi stock offer
root.body: schult home corp announc initi public offer 833,334 unit five dlr per unit sai jannei montgomeri scott inc woolcott co manag underwrit offer sai unit consist on common share on warrant bui on half share common warrant will entitl holder bui on half common share 5.50 dlr per full share march on 1988 septemb on 1989 thereaft 6.50 dlr per full share march 1991 sai
